data.fullContent: Six distinct experiments were included on the mission of the space shuttle Columbia. Collectively, they were intended to test how various substances and organic materials respond to conditions in space. The experiments included dust from the desert, xenon ( an inert gas ), and projects from several elementary school students. The experiments were terminated during the disintegration of the shuttle upon its turbulent re-entry into the atmosphere.
data.answer: 在哥伦比亚号航天飞机的任务中有六项不同的实验。总的来说，他们的目的是测试各种物质和有机材料对空间条件的反应。这些实验包括来自沙漠的尘埃、氙(一种惰性气体)和几个学生项目。实验在航天飞机返回大气层时因湍流而解体时终止。
